hero.title: The ultimate
hero.subtitle: Connect any anime site. Our AI learns the structure and indexes everything locally on your Windows PC.

about.title: What is AniDock?
about.description: AniDock is an open source desktop software that revolutionizes how you organize and watch anime. Paste the link to any site, our AI analyzes the structure, automatically creates a "driver" and indexes the entire catalog locally on your computer. Totally free and open source.

features.title: Amazing features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to organize and watch anime your way

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: 100% open code on GitHub. Total transparency, audit and contribute to the project.

aiLearning.title: Learning AI
aiLearning.description: Paste any anime site URL. Our AI analyzes the HTML structure and creates drivers automatically.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Everything runs locally. Zero telemetry, zero tracking. Your data never leaves your PC.

shareDrivers.title: Share Drivers
shareDrivers.description: Export and share drivers with friends. Import drivers created by the community.

smartIndexing.title: Smart Indexing
smartIndexing.description: Complete catalogs indexed locally. Fast search and automatic organization.

integratedPlayer.title: Integrated Player
integratedPlayer.description: Watch directly in the app or open external links. Complete viewing history.

lightFast.title: Light & Fast
lightFast.description: Quick installation. Starts in seconds. Fluid and responsive interface.
